name: Quizer
description:
Theme: "Two Sides"

There are two options in "two sides" you need to select the correct one

It is a mix between a quiz and a platformer its a quiz platformer - Quizer

Controls:

A and D or Left and Right Arrow To Move 

Space or W or Up Arrow To Jump

E or Left Shift To Select The Answer

Made By:

Code: Mayur Games

Art: Legends Games

Made In 72 hours for the Ben Bonk Game Jam #3

Music By Jonas Tyroller in the Wowie Resources Pack
